meanings.definition: The act of writing or creating a literary work.
meanings.sent1: Her authorship of the novel was evident in every chapter.
meanings.sent2: The authorship of the play was attributed to the famous playwright.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of experience, his authorship of the poem surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her authorship shone brightly in the sea of aspiring writers.
meanings.sent5: The authorship of the book was unmistakably unique and captivating.

meanings.definition: The state or fact of being the writer or creator of a literary work.
meanings.sent1: The authorship of the article was acknowledged by the editor.
meanings.sent2: His authorship of the short story brought him recognition.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed authorship of the mysterious disappearance of the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her authorship of the painting was a masterpiece of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The authorship of the poem revealed a deep understanding of emotions.
